channel.title: SoulSplit Released
channel.description:
[img]http://soulsplit.com/soulsplit.png[/img]
Don't say it's advertisement. cuz it isn't just change the ip-.-
REP/COMMENT OR I REMOVE NO ANTI LEECH, I JUST WANTED TO GIVE PEOPLE A REASONABLE PI.
Server had 709 players on on a 1GB Dedicated without lagging even a little bit.
and oyeah it has working claw spec,
Enjoy ppl a lot of work in here=)
Client Auto downloads cache, the cache is located here:
[url=http://soulsplit.com/SoulSplit1.zip]http://soulsplit.com/SoulSplit1.zip[/url]
SOURCE HAS BEEN UPDATED AND A GFX BUG HAS BEEN FIXED, MAKE SURE TO DOWNLOAD THE NEWEST VERSION! Source and Client Download: [url=http://uppit.com/38ffs49gaj7s/Soul_Split_Server_+_Client.rar]Click here to download[/url]
[img]http://soulsplit.com/x10.gif[/img] [color=red]100% Hybriding and Switching [img]http://soulsplit.com/gmaul.gif[/img] [img]http://soulsplit.com/dds.gif[/img]
Falador PVP, Just like a PvP World, with safeszones, everything, you can also get pvp drops up on your pk drops, you won't keep any items here. and you will stay red skulled ( Danger skull means you will lose all your items )
[img]http://soulsplit.com/fala.gif[/img] [img]http://soulsplit.com/pvp.gif[/img]
[QUOTE]To change the ip go to client.java in the Client, then search for server = and change it to your servers/localhost ip address (to test it while ur hosting on ur own computer change it to 127.0.0.1)[/QUOTE] [QUOTE]To remove hits times 10 simply go to client > client.java and search for newdamage = true; change it to newdamage = false; it basically only updates the hit masks=)[/QUOTE]
Comin soon
Q: Why did you release? A: I've learnt so much from this community, i'd love to give something back, so enjoy.
Q: Is this the current source? A: Yeah, but mine is a pickup server now.
Q: Can we leech and host your source? A: Sure as long as you don't do this: [IMG]http://soulsplit.com/LMAO.png[/img]
Q: Can we expect any help for coding by pming you? A: Sure, if i have time to answer.
Features:
- Features - [B]*255 region fix[/B](Fix by Arista) * No Lag * 24\7 [b]* Turmoil[/b] * Open staff spots! * Hold up to 1500 Players * All Godswords with Real Special * 100% Duel Arena (Staking,Rules,and ability to disable armor slots) * Training * Amazing hybriding * Autocasting * Barrows * Pest Control * Clan Chat * Skilling * Slayer with Tasks * God Wars * KBD * Dagannoth Kings * Chaos Elemental * Fight Pits * Jad * Obelisks that teleport you around in wild * Split Private Chat * Duping Fixed * Emotes * Trade with no Bugs * Great Economy * Custom SoulSplit point shop * Perfect Pking!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ CREDITS:
ME(PIM/ZRPS) SANITY ARISTA JAYDEND12
